thread.title: BRIEF-Oblate International Pastoral Investment Trust Urges Pilgrims Pride's Shareholders To Vote For Proposal "Adopt And Implement A Water Stewardship Policy"

title: BRIEF-Oblate International Pastoral Investment Trust Urges Pilgrims Pride's Shareholders To Vote For Proposal "Adopt And Implement A Water Stewardship Policy"
text:
Market News April 30, 2018 / 4:30 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Oblate International Pastoral Investment Trust Urges Pilgrims Pride's Shareholders To Vote For Proposal "Adopt And Implement A Water Stewardship Policy" Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
April 30 (Reuters) - Pilgrims Pride Corp:
* OBLATE INTERNATIONAL PASTORAL INVESTMENT TRUST - URGES PILGRIMS PRIDE'S SHAREHOLDERS TO VOTE FOR PROPOSAL "ADOPT AND IMPLEMENT A WATER STEWARDSHIP POLICY" - SEC FILING Source text - bit.ly/2jj55Um Further company coverage:
